newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Jupiters Q1 trading ahead of yr ago.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Jupiters Q1 trading ahead of yr ago.

text.p: Casino and gaming machine operator Jupiters Ltd said on Thursday trading in the first quarter of the year ending June 30, 1997 had comfortably exceeded the same period last year.
"I am pleased to report that a good start has been made to the current financial year," Jupiters Chairman Lawrence Willett said in his address to the company's annual meeting.
"Trading for the September quarter at both Jupiters Casino and Treasury Casino has comfortably exceeded the same period last year," he said.
Jupiters also said that its planned to expand the availability of KENO gambling network machines throughout Queensland's Clubs, Hotels and TABs.
"Its (KENO's) establishment cost is estimated to be in excess of A$20 million, which will be debt funded," Willett said.
"State wide KENO wil be operated by a newly established division of Jupiters Ltd (called) Jupiters Network Gaming," he said.
